export function loadTweets(callback){var xhr=new XMLHttpRequest();var method="GET";//'POST'
var url="http://localhost:8000/api/tweets/";var responseType="json";xhr.responseType=responseType;xhr.open(method,url);xhr.onload=function(){callback(xhr.response,xhr.status);};xhr.onerror=function(e){console.log(e);callback({'message':'There is an error'},400);};xhr.send();}
